recipe.title: Miso-glazed fish
recipe.description: Grilled fish marinated in an Asian miso sauce, with a salad of sesame flavoured brown rice
recipe.author: Chrissy Freer

dish.name: miso-marinated fish
dish.step: Combine the [miso paste|1.1], [soy sauce|2.1], [orange juice|3.1], [garlic|4.1] and [honey|5.1] in a glass or ceramic bowl. Add the [fish|6.1] and turn to coat. Cover and place in the fridge for 30 minutes to marinate.

Preheat the oven to 200 °C. Drain the fish from the marinade, loosely wrap the fillets in aluminium foil and place on a baking tray. Bake for 12 minutes or until the fish is golden and flakes easily when tested with a fork.

dish.name: rice and salad
dish.step: Meanwhile, use a vegetable peeler to peel the [cucumber|7.1] into ribbons. Place the cucumber and [avocado|8.1] in a bowl. Add the [vinegar|9.1] and [oil|10.1] and toss to combine.
Divide the [rice|11.1] among plates. Top with the avocado mixture and fish. Sprinkle with the [sesame seeds|12.1]. Serve with [steamed snow peas|13.1].
